devdoc.author: Danny Thomx
devdoc.details: Ensure you're familiar with ERC721 standard before interacting with this contract.

mintItem(uint256).details: The function checks for maximum minting limit and ensures correct payment.

params._mintAmount: Number of NFTs user wants to mint.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setDefaultAccountImplementation(address).details: Only the owner can set this.

params._accountAddress: Address of the default account implementation.

setMaxSupply(uint256).details: Only the owner can change this.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw().details: Only the owner can call this.

buidlGuidl.details: Address of the buidlGuidl for revenue sharing.

color_1.details: Mapping to store colors associated with NFTs.

defaultAccountImplementation.details: Address of the default account implementation.

mainAccount.details: Mapping to store main accounts for each tokenId.

maxMintAmount.details: Maximum number of NFTs one can mint in a single transaction.

maxSupply.details: Maximum number of NFTs available for minting.

paused.details: State variable to control minting functionality.

team.details: Address of the team for revenue sharing.

tokenIdToDefaultAccountImplementation.details: Mapping to store default accounts for each tokenId.

devdoc.title: NBA NFT Contract

constructor.notice: Contract constructor to set the name and symbol for the NFT.

mintItem(uint256).notice: Allows users to mint new NFTs.

pause(bool).notice: Owner users to pause minting of NFTs.

setBGAddress(address).notice: Owner users to change buidlGuidl's address.

setMainAccount(uint256,address).notice: Set main account for a specific tokenId.

setMaxSupply(uint256).notice: Sets the maximum amount of NFTs that can be minted in one transaction.

setTeamAddress(address).notice: Owner users to change team's address.

tokenURI(uint256).notice: Provides the URI for a specific NFT.

withdraw().notice: Allows the owner to withdraw the contract's balance.

userdoc.notice: This contract mints and manages the NBA NFTs.
